approaches.title: Loop and Append to List
approaches.blurb: Use a series of loops to find maxima, minima and matrix coordinates.

approaches.title: List Comprehensions with Nested Loop
approaches.blurb: Use List Comprehensions to find maxima and minima and a nested loop for matrix coordinates.

approaches.title: List Comprehensions with a Nested List Comprehension
approaches.blurb: Use List Comprehensions to find maxima and minima and a nested comprehension for matrix coordinates

approaches.title: Nested List Comprehensions with Coordinates.
approaches.blurb: Use Nested List Comprehensions to find maxima, minima, and coordinates.

approaches.title: Nested Set Comprehensions with Coordinates.
approaches.blurb: Use Nested Set Comprehensions to find maxima, minima, and coordinates.
